We are often described as being composed of body, mind and spirit.The LORD also uses the word spirit in scripture in reference to himself. It is my hope that the SPIRIT of the living GOD rests upon us and guides us to truth!

Meditate on these verses to gain wisdom:

    -   John 4:24
-   Week 2

-   Week 3

-   Week 4

-   Week 5
    -   Numbers 11:29
